meta.title: Contact
meta.description: Get in touch about roles, projects, or ideas.

sections.intro: If you’d like to talk about a role, a project, or an idea, feel free to reach out. I’m always open to a conversation.
sections.workWithMe: I work at the intersection of operations, systems, and software — helping organizations build clarity into complex work.
sections.auroraNote: If you’re curious about Aurora, I’m happy to talk about its concepts and direction at a high level.
sections.confirmationMessage: Thank you for reaching out — I’ll get back to you soon.
